INSERT INTO test_case_label_rel(label_id,label_name,project_id, object_version_number, created_by, creation_date, last_updated_by, last_update_date) VALUES
(#{caseLabel.labelId}, #{caseLabel.labelName}, #{caseLabel.projectId}, #{caseLabel.testData}, #{caseLabel.expectedResult}, 1, #{caseLabel.createdBy}, #{caseLabel.creationDate}, #{caseLabel.lastUpdatedBy}, #{caseLabel.lastUpdateDate})
